docs.snippet: Federal investigators already knew about a wealthy Malaysian businessman when his $48 million Gulfstream jet touched down in neon-lit Las Vegas last June, days after his arrest and release in Macau on allegations he headed an operation that took i...
docs.lead_paragraph: Federal investigators already knew about a wealthy Malaysian businessman when his $48 million Gulfstream jet touched down in neon-lit Las Vegas last June, days after his arrest and release in Macau on allegations he headed an operation that took illegal bets on World Cup soccer games.
